name: Dante Miller
who_you_serve: The program is aimed at current students, recent graduates, early career professionals, career-changers, and aspiring professionals looking to improve their employability in the tech industry.
what_you_do: The Experience exceler8or Challenge is an intensive program designed to enhance employability for cyber security and computer science students by providing practical experience through live projects and skill development.
signature_programs: 48 Days to the Work and Life You Love, Coaching Mastery Program, DISC Certification Program
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: Coaching Mastery Program, Coaching With Excellence events
bio: NY Times Bestselling Author, host of the 48 Days to the Work You Love Podcast, featured in CBS-The Early Show, Fox Business News, Entrepreneur Magazine, and more.
